item.title: List of minor planet discoverers
item.description: This is a list of minor-planet discoverers credited by the Minor Planet Center with the discovery of one or several minor planets (such as near-Earth and main-belt asteroids, Jupiter trojans and distant objects). As of January 2022, the discovery of 612,011 numbered minor planets are credited to 1,141 astronomers and 253 observatories, telescopes or surveys (see ยง Discovering dedicated institutions). On how a discovery is made, see observations of small Solar System bodies. For a description of the tables below, see ยง Notes.
